text: The 1966 NCAA University Division Golf Championship was the 28th annual NCAA- sanctioned golf tournament to determine the individual and team national champions of men's collegiate golf in the United States. The tournament was held at the Stanford Golf Course in Stanford, California, hosted by Stanford University. Two-time defending champions Houston won the team title, the Cougars' ninth NCAA team national title. ==Individual results== ===Individual champion=== * Bob Murphy, Florida ==Team results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! dat-sort-type=number|Rank !!
